message: Thanks to my EST jetlag, this may be the first conference breakfast I can attend without significant pain. Also, kudos to the organizers for running it until a geek-friendly 10:00.
Armando's breakfast looks good.

I know a fair number of people who use "fork" because there isn't a "bookmark" or "favorite" option.

2/3 of Github projects are empty. http://blog.garlicsim.org/post/4472104984/2-out-of-3-github-forks-are-completely-empty
